command.script:
#!/bin/bash set -eu (( $# != 3 )) && { printf >&2 'usage: $0 repository release pkg1,...,pkgN
' exit 2 } REPOSITORY=$1 RELEASE=$2 PACKAGES=$3
# Split the "packages" multi-value option using the comma delimiter IFS=, PACKAGELIST=(${PACKAGES})
printf "Promote packages from release: '$RELEASE', repository '$REPOSITORY':" printf "
" for package in "${PACKAGELIST[@]:-}" do printf -- "- %-10s pushed
" $package done
printf "Completed promoting ${#PACKAGELIST[*]} packages.
" exit $?

job.description: promote the packages to the ops repository.
job.name: Promote
